<script>function replaceWithDefaultFavicon(img) {
  img.onerror = "";
  img.crossOrigin='true';
  img.src = "https://www.g2.com/assets/question-50fdf34e0856fc4dfc534e72c65f8718088b3be375f4820932d751e62057c420.png";
  return true;
}</script><script>function replaceWithDefaultImg(img, src) {
  img.onerror = "";
  img.src = src;
  return true;
}

function replaceWithDefaultThumb(img) {
  return replaceWithDefaultImg(img, "https://www.g2.com/assets/fallback/defaultthumb-97cd53a46372b6b7058149106c7e5e3ac135a98e91b0877e430de6e8faf7e41e.png");
}

function replaceWithDefaultDetail(img) {
  return replaceWithDefaultImg(img, "https://www.g2.com/assets/fallback/default-6632ce065b4875adb88aec465e288328b3a998ba2d0d6e27ffe5a7ea65497efc.png");
}

function replaceWithAvatar(img) {
  return replaceWithDefaultImg(img, "https://www.g2.com/assets/icons/anonymous-avatar-purple-4ae1032bdb50ee5682003170c8184aee790d25958bd397abbd384ba52c596a7b.svg");
}

function replaceWithMonogram(img) {
  img.classList.remove('monogram__hider');
  img.classList.add('is-hidden');

  img.nextSibling.style.display = 'flex';
  img.style.display = 'none';
}</script><script>function hideBrokenImage(img) { img.style.display='none'; }</script><script>
  function preEvent(el, ev) {
    el.addEventListener('vvidget:initialized', function (e) {
      $(el).trigger(ev);
    }, false);
  }
</script>

data-poison-text=""><div class="l5 pb-0">What is Asana?</div><div class="overflow-scrollbar-auto max-h-40" data-max-height-expand-event-description="PDPs Overview Description" data-max-height-expand-show-less-text="Show Less<svg xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&quot; contain=&quot;paint&quot; buffered-rendering=&quot;static&quot; viewBox=&quot;0 0 10 10&quot; revealer" ue="max-height-expand"><div class="ws-pw" data-poison="" itemprop="description"><p>Why is Asana highly ranked across multiple G2 Grids for categories including Project Management,  Work Management, and Objectives and Key Results with more than 9,000 user reviews?   

Because we help teams orchestrate their cross-functional work, from daily tasks to strategic initiatives. With Asana, teams have more clarity, move faster, and accomplish more with lessâ€”no matter where theyâ€™re located. 

Asana was built thoughtfully, so you can execute according to plan. Where other work management platforms appear to focus on quantity over quality of features, Asana is focused on the scalability and reliability of its platformâ€”so you can always be ready to work. 

Asana is used by 80% of Fortune 100 companies. More than 139,000 paying organizations and millions across 200 countries rely on us to manage product launches, marketing campaigns, company objectives, and more.

8.015V3.957L5.017.915l-5.016 3v4l5-3z"></path></svg></span></a><div class=" hide-if-js" id="25482b6bc22a2961facb088147481407"><div class="l5 pb-0">Product Description</div><p>Asana helps teams orchestrate their work, from small projects to strategic initiatives. Headquartered in San Francisco, CA, Asana has more than 139,000 paying customers and millions of free organizations across 200 countries. Global customers such as Amazon, Japan Airlines, Sky, and Affirm rely on Asana to manage everything from company objectives to digital transformation to product launches and marketing campaigns.</p><div class="l5">How do you position yourself against your competitors?</div><p></p><p>With Asana, organizations can orchestrate their work in a living system where everyone can see, discuss, and execute on company priorities. </p>

<p>Because Asana is so easy for users in any function to adopt, team members can get organized and start collaborating right away. And when chaos becomes clarity, everyone accomplishes more. </p>

<p>Along with helping any single team, Asana also brings disparate teams together. By eliminating silos, teams can do their best work and make the biggest impact together. </p>

<p>Asana is the only product to create organization-wide visibility. When you connect your organization's mission and goals to the underlying work, leaders can effortlessly track progress, identify risks, and pivot teams to achieve company goals.</p>

<p>Asana replaces anxiety and overload with confidence and flow. employees on LinkedInÂ®</div></div></div></div></div><div class="l5">Description</div><p></p><p>Asana helps teams orchestrate their work, from small projects to strategic initiatives. Headquartered in San Francisco, CA, Asana has more than 114,000 paying customers and millions of free organizations across 190 countries. Global customers such as Amazon, Japan Airlines, Sky, and Affirm rely on Asana to manage everything from company objectives to digital transformation to product launches and marketing campaigns. </p><p></p><div class="media-object"><hr><div class="media-object-section"><a href="https://www.g2.com/users/ad2443c7-659d-45de-bfbe-f97614799a82"><div class="avatar avatar-- "><div class="avatar__monogram avatar__monogram--blue"><span>EC</span></div></div></a></div><div class="media-object-section"><div class="lh-100"><div class="fw-semibold">Overview Provided by:</div><a class="link" href="https://www.g2.com/users/ad2443c7-659d-45de-bfbe-f97614799a82"><div class="my-half link--header-color">Erica Conti</div><div class="my-half"></div></a></div></div></div></div></div></div><div class="paper paper--nestable"><div class="l5">Values &amp; Ethics</div>Each of our values is aligned with what will guide us to achieve our mission: To help humanity thrive by enabling the world's teams to work together effortlessly.<div class="grid gap-x-5 grid-cols-1 md:grid-cols-2"><div class="mt-1"><div class="flex ai-c mb-half"><svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" contain="paint" buffered-rendering="static" viewBox="0 0 100 86.6" class="extra-small mr-half r-90 c-rorange-100 icon-chevron nessy-only" aria-hidden="true" focusable="false" role="presentation"><path d="M100 86.6V28.8L50 0 0 28.9v57.7l50-28.9z"></path></svg><div class="l5 m-0">Do great things, fast</div></div><p>We commit to being great at the things we do and doing them fast, without sacrificing one for the other.</p></div><div class="mt-1"><div class="flex ai-c mb-half"><svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" contain="paint" buffered-rendering="static" viewBox="0 0 100 86.6" class="extra-small mr-half r-90 c-rorange-100 icon-chevron nessy-only" aria-hidden="true" focusable="false" role="presentation"><path d="M100 86.6V28.8L50 0 0 28.9v57.7l50-28.9z"></path></svg><div class="l5 m-0">Clarity</div></div><p>Our product and culture aim to ensure that teams know who is doing what, by when, and why.</p></div><div class="mt-1"><div class="flex ai-c mb-half"><svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" contain="paint" buffered-rendering="static" viewBox="0 0 100 86.6" class="extra-small mr-half r-90 c-rorange-100 icon-chevron nessy-only" aria-hidden="true" focusable="false" role="presentation"><path d="M100 86.6V28.8L50 0 0 28.9v57.7l50-28.9z"></path></svg><div class="l5 m-0">Co-creation</div></div><p>Great achievements are almost always the result not of one, but many. We work with empathy and trust to do great things.</p></div><div class="mt-1"><div class="flex ai-c mb-half"><svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" contain="paint" buffered-rendering="static" viewBox="0 0 100 86.6" class="extra-small mr-half r-90 c-rorange-100 icon-chevron nessy-only" aria-hidden="true" focusable="false" role="presentation"><path d="M100 86.6V28.8L50 0 0 deprioritize.</p></div></div><div class="flex flex-col"><a ue="revealer" text-midnight text-lg">G2 reviews are an important part of the buying process, and we understand the value they provide to  both our customers and buyers. To ensure the value is retained, it's important to make certain that  reviews are authentic and trustworthy, which is why G2 requires verified methods to write a review and  validates the reviewer's identity before approving. G2 validates the reviewers identity with our  moderation process that prevents inauthentic reviews, and we strive to collect reviews in a responsible and ethical manner.</div><div class="pt-1/2 This reviewer was not provided any incentive by G2 for completing this review." ue="tooltip">Review source: Seller invite</div></div></div><div class="paper__bd"><div class="d-f mb-1"><div class="f-1 d-f ai-c mb-half-small-only"><div class="stars large xlarge--medium-down stars-9"></div><div class="time-stamp pl-4th ws-nw"><span><span class="x-current-review-date" data-poison-date=""><meta content="2024-08-12" itemprop="datePublished"><time datetime="2024-08-12">Aug 12, 2024</time></span></span></div></div></div><div class="d-f"><div class="f-1"><div class="callout warning">Guest users or non-business users of the software, not included in G2 scores.</div><div data-poison=""><a class="pjax" href="https://www.g2.com/products/asana/reviews/asana-review-9990199"><div class="m-0 l2" itemprop="name">"Turning Chaos into Harmony"</div></a></div><div data-poison-text=""><div itemprop="reviewBody"><div><div class="l5 mt-2">What do you like best about Asana?</div><div><p class="formatted-text">For Working Management, Asana did a great job putting it all together. It's easy to implement and easy to integrate with other tools like Zapier, Google Calendar, Slack, etc. 
</p><p class="formatted-text">
</p><p class="formatted-text">I always use Asana in my daily work now and it does a great job capturing and covering all the projects, helping my team to collaborate, assigning tasks, and monitoring projects has never been this easy. 
</p><p class="formatted-text">
</p><p class="formatted-text">Will always recommend Asana to everyone out there! <span class="spht">Review collected by and hosted on G2.com.</span></p></div></div><div><div class="l5 mt-2">What do you dislike about Asana?</div><div><p class="formatted-text">For me who uses it daily as a Project Manager, Asana does lots of wonder. But for some people (especially the creative team), it's really hard for them to use Asana. Maybe they're struggling in learning the new tools and didn't familiarize themselves enough with lots of features that are already in Asana. 
</p><p class="formatted-text">
</p><p class="formatted-text">Maybe if there's a way to give a little more onboarding tips to new users on how to use Asana in-app, it'll be helpful. <span class="spht">Review collected by and hosted on G2.com.</span></p></div></div><div class="expanded-review-9990199 is-hidden-default"><div class="l5 mt-2">What problems is Asana solving and how is that benefiting you?</div><div><p class="formatted-text">Asana helped me solve Project Management hardships, helping me with task management and project collaboration.
</p><p class="formatted-text">It helps me and my team to stay on track with the schedule and know what tasks or projects need to be prioritized first. <span class="spht">Review collected by and hosted on G2.com.</span></p></div></div></div><div class="flex justify-between"><a class="link d-f ai-c x-show-more js-log-click" ue="toggle-class login-modal-toggle" role="presentation"><path d="M13.333 0L6.667 6.667l-4-4L0 5.333 6.667 12 16 2.667z"></path></svg></div></div><div class="tag" data-container="body" title="Invitation from a seller or affiliate. This reviewer was offered a nominal incentive as thanks for completing this review." ue="tooltip">Review source: Seller invite</div><div class="tag" title="This reviewer was offered a nominal incentive as thanks for completing this review." ue="tooltip">Incentivized Review</div></div></div><div class="paper__bd"><div class="d-f mb-1"><div class="f-1 d-f ai-c mb-half-small-only"><div class="stars large xlarge--medium-down stars-10"></div><div class="time-stamp pl-4th ws-nw"><span><span class="x-current-review-date" data-poison-date=""><meta content="2024-07-03" itemprop="datePublished"><time datetime="2024-07-03">Jul 03, 2024</time></span></span></div></div></div><div class="d-f"><div class="f-1"><div data-poison=""><a class="pjax" href="https://www.g2.com/products/asana/reviews/asana-review-9860991"><div class="m-0 l2" itemprop="name">"Great Product for Project Management and Workflow at all levels"</div></a></div><div data-poison-text=""><div itemprop="reviewBody"><div><div class="l5 mt-2">What do you like best about Asana?</div><div><p class="formatted-text">Robust application has many features, yet as a beginner using Asana, I can set up what I need efficiently with the tutorial videos and training events they offer for users.  As a project manager, I manage multiple projects with many deadlines and this will help our teams be able to not only see status but access information on any project all in one place, even linking to our Dropbox account. <span class="spht">Review collected by and hosted on G2.com.</span></p></div></div><div><div class="l5 mt-2">What do you dislike about Asana?</div><div><p class="formatted-text">Would like personal assistance in setting up -and if not, maybe even some questions about the user when the begin asking about what kinds of projects they are doing and what their goals are and then make some suggestions about where to begin in the video and tutorial trainings. <span class="spht">Review collected by and hosted on G2.com.</span></p></div></div><div class="expanded-review-9860991 is-hidden-default"><div class="l5 mt-2">What problems is Asana solving and how is that benefiting you?</div><div><p class="formatted-text">Asana is helping me manage multiple projects with multiple tasks, some repetitive, some are customized per project, with multiple deadlines that repeat ever year or two years.  The projects are able to get completed more efficiently with multiple teams collaborating on the project and we can see progress to ensure more consistent productivity.  This allows an office of all remote workers to be on the same page of every project on a daily basis and allows for checks and balances to build our best practices much more efficiently. <span class="spht">Review collected by and hosted on G2.com.</span></p></div></div></div><div class="flex justify-between"><a class="link d-f ai-c x-show-more js-log-click" ue="toggle-class This review was written entirely without invitation or incentive from G2, a seller, or an affiliate." ue="tooltip">Review source: Organic</div></div></div><div class="paper__bd"><div class="d-f mb-1"><div class="f-1 d-f ai-c mb-half-small-only"><div class="stars large xlarge--medium-down stars-10"></div><div class="time-stamp pl-4th ws-nw"><span><span class="x-current-review-date" data-poison-date=""><meta content="2024-08-02" itemprop="datePublished"><time datetime="2024-08-02">Aug 02, 2024</time></span></span></div></div></div><div class="d-f"><div class="f-1"><div data-poison=""><a class="pjax" href="https://www.g2.com/products/asana/reviews/asana-review-9956118"><div class="m-0 l2" itemprop="name">"Asana Bettter than Click Up? - I think so"</div></a></div><div data-poison-text=""><div itemprop="reviewBody"><div><div class="l5 mt-2">What do you like best about Asana?</div><div><p class="formatted-text">As someone that always used click up I have to say im impressed with Asana and the ease of setting up things and the flow between apps. As a web design and hosting company we use Asana for our tasks integrated together with slack and other apps and it works so well. Even everhour is a great add on. <span class="spht">Review collected by and hosted on G2.com.</span></p></div></div><div><div class="l5 mt-2">What do you dislike about Asana?</div><div><p class="formatted-text">This is where Asana struggles- pricing. Click up gives you almost the same features on the free plan with a AI assistant and upgrading is a lot cheaper. So its hard for those who are a small agency to afford Asana long term especially if you are going to be needing other tools for your agency. <span class="spht">Review collected by and hosted on G2.com.</span></p></div></div><div class="expanded-review-9956118 is-hidden-default"><div class="l5 mt-2">What problems is Asana solving and how is that benefiting you?</div><div><p class="formatted-text">Its solving all my freelancing work projects and helps me to stay up to date with my tasks. Its also easy to get feed back from other team members and to prioritize your hours in a more streamlined way. At the end of the day as a freelancer its all about your hours and not wasting time. Asana helps you to stay on track and get what you need from clients faster then back and forward on email. Its a great product management tool. <span class="spht">Review collected by and hosted on G2.com.</span></p></div></div></div><div class="flex justify-between"><a class="link d-f ai-c x-show-more xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" contain="paint" buffered-rendering="static" viewBox="0 0 16 12" class="c-teal-100 tiny ml-half icon-checkmark-thick nessy-only" aria-hidden="true" focusable="false" role="presentation"><path d="M13.333 0L6.667 6.667l-4-4L0 5.333 6.667 12 16 2.667z"></path></svg></div></div><div class="tag" data-container="body" title="Invitation from a seller or affiliate. This reviewer was not provided any incentive by G2 for completing this review." ue="tooltip">Review source: Seller invite</div></div></div><div class="paper__bd"><div class="d-f mb-1"><div class="f-1 d-f ai-c mb-half-small-only"><div class="stars large xlarge--medium-down stars-9"></div><div class="time-stamp pl-4th ws-nw"><span><span class="x-current-review-date" data-poison-date=""><meta content="2024-07-31" itemprop="datePublished"><time datetime="2024-07-31">Jul 31, 2024</time></span></span></div></div></div><div class="d-f"><div class="f-1"><div data-poison=""><a class="pjax" href="https://www.g2.com/products/asana/reviews/asana-review-9944639"><div class="m-0 l2" itemprop="name">"Asana is a sanity"</div></a></div><div data-poison-text=""><div itemprop="reviewBody"><div><div class="l5 mt-2">What do you like best about Asana?</div><div><p class="formatted-text">The connecting workflow helps keep us on track. I also like how the online forms can collect information, dump into asana, move with my rules, and export into google sheets. <span class="spht">Review collected by and hosted on G2.com.</span></p></div></div><div><div class="l5 mt-2">What do you dislike about Asana?</div><div><p class="formatted-text">It took me about 5 months of building out, and restructure my Asana to get it right for us. I wish there was someone I could speak with that could have helped me set sail. Data/task organization can become overwhelming when there's multiple considerations. Through this mental workout of building it out, I have a lot of respect for anyone who handles information! But Asana could do much better and help new customers take off with real 1 on 1 help. I nearly quit Asana multiple times early on becuase I was tired of trying to figure things out. Directing users to watch videos and read forms is progressively becoming my pet peeve. Inevitaby we all spend the time of which 1/2 aren't relevant and never learning this till after the fact. <span class="spht">Review collected by and hosted on G2.com.</span></p></div></div><div class="expanded-review-9944639 is-hidden-default"><div class="l5 mt-2">What problems is Asana solving and how is that benefiting you?</div><div><p class="formatted-text">At work intake, it generates everyones job and forces them to check the box before we can continue. It also communicates to other users letting them know when it's their turn. This ensures greater accuracy for project completion, and makes it easier as a manger to see where we are collectively. <span class="spht">Review collected by and hosted on G2.com.</span></p></div></div></div><div class="flex justify-between"><a class="link d-f ai-c x-show-more js-log-click" ue="toggle-class login-modal-toggle" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" contain="paint" buffered-rendering="static" viewBox="0 0 16 12" class="c-teal-100 tiny ml-half icon-checkmark-thick nessy-only" aria-hidden="true" focusable="false" role="presentation"><path d="M13.333 0L6.667 6.667l-4-4L0 5.333 6.667 12 16 2.667z"></path></svg></div></div><div class="tag" data-container="body" title="Invitation from a seller or affiliate. This reviewer was offered a nominal incentive as thanks for completing this review." ue="tooltip">Review source: Seller invite</div><div class="tag" title="This reviewer was offered a nominal incentive as thanks for completing this review." ue="tooltip">Incentivized Review</div></div></div><div class="paper__bd"><div class="d-f mb-1"><div class="f-1 d-f ai-c mb-half-small-only"><div class="stars large xlarge--medium-down stars-10"></div><div class="time-stamp pl-4th ws-nw"><span><span class="x-current-review-date" data-poison-date=""><meta content="2024-07-29" itemprop="datePublished"><time datetime="2024-07-29">Jul 29, 2024</time></span></span></div></div></div><div class="d-f"><div class="f-1"><div data-poison=""><a class="pjax" href="https://www.g2.com/products/asana/reviews/asana-review-9933162"><div class="m-0 l2" itemprop="name">"If you're not super technical, Asana is for you!"</div></a></div><div data-poison-text=""><div itemprop="reviewBody"><div><div class="l5 mt-2">What do you like best about Asana?</div><div><p class="formatted-text">I started using Asana in 2019. I tried the free version for years because my business budget was tight, and I couldn't afford a robust tech stack. But when I did have some extra money, I ran to Asana to upgrade. 
</p><p class="formatted-text">
</p><p class="formatted-text">Over those two years of using the free version, I loved how easy the platform was to use. Having tried more technical project management tools, Asana was so easy to useâ€”and fun! (Who doesn't love a rainbow character shooting across the screen when you finish a task?!)
</p><p class="formatted-text">
</p><p class="formatted-text">Now, I log into Asana every day before I jump into work. 
</p><p class="formatted-text">It's the lifeblood of my business and my number one accountability partner. 
</p><p class="formatted-text">
</p><p class="formatted-text">If I have a new idea when I'm walking with my dog, I grab my phone and open Asana to jot it down. If we onboard a new team member, the first thing we do is explain how important Asana is to our business and give them a tour. <span class="spht">Review collected by and hosted on G2.com.</span></p></div></div><div><div class="l5 mt-2">What do you dislike about Asana?</div><div><p class="formatted-text">The only downside to Asana is not being able to add team members at different levels for your subscription. For instance, as a business owner, I'd like access to features like "Goals" and "Portfolios" without having to pay for our entire team to upgrade. But, we manage anyway. <span class="spht">Review collected by and hosted on G2.com.</span></p></div></div><div class="expanded-review-9933162 is-hidden-default"><div class="l5 mt-2">What problems is Asana solving and how is that benefiting you?</div><div><p class="formatted-text">Asana helps our team stay organized and on-track. Before we begin any new project, we outline all the tasks we need to complete and assign them a due date. It's been game-changing for team collaboration and communication to have everything documented in one place. <span class="spht">Review collected by and hosted on G2.com.</span></p></div></div></div><div class="flex justify-between"><a class="link d-f ai-c x-show-more js-log-click" ue="toggle-class login-modal-toggle" data-toggle-class-targets=".expanded-review-9933162" data-toggle-class-value="is-hidden-default" data-toggle-class-login-required="true" data-login-modal-toggle-allow-untrusted-user="true" data-login-and-return="true" data-login-anchor="survey-response-9933162" data-event-options="{&quot;product_id&quot;:278,&quot;product_uuid&quot;:&quot;ababe6c4-cb0d-4e1c-9416-6d554f3dd3ff&quot;,&quot;product&quot;:&quot;Asana&quot;,&quot;vendor_id&quot;:243,&quot;product_type&quot;:&quot;Software&quot;,&quot;name&quot;:&quot;Event::Products::Reviews::ReadMore&quot;}" This reviewer was offered a nominal incentive as thanks for completing this review." ue="tooltip">Review source: Seller invite</div><div class="tag" title="This reviewer was offered a nominal incentive as thanks for completing this review." ue="tooltip">Incentivized Review</div></div></div><div class="paper__bd"><div class="d-f mb-1"><div class="f-1 d-f ai-c mb-half-small-only"><div class="stars large xlarge--medium-down stars-10"></div><div class="time-stamp pl-4th ws-nw"><span><span class="x-current-review-date" data-poison-date=""><meta content="2024-07-23" itemprop="datePublished"><time datetime="2024-07-23">Jul 23, 2024</time></span></span></div></div></div><div class="d-f"><div class="f-1"><div data-poison=""><a class="pjax" href="https://www.g2.com/products/asana/reviews/asana-review-9917037"><div class="m-0 l2" itemprop="name">"Fantastic Task Management Program"</div></a></div><div data-poison-text=""><div itemprop="reviewBody"><div><div class="l5 mt-2">What do you like best about Asana?</div><div><p class="formatted-text">Asana manages to streamline and automate complicated processes in a very simple manner. I've used Asana for about 6 years and they excel in so many areas that other SaaS programs that pale in comparison. The tutorial and educational content is easy to navigate and watch. The Ambassador Community and Forum Leaders are a fantastic resource to learn more about different use cases or gain insights from different perspectives. It's easily customizable within a simple framework. The ability to "multihome" tasks so you're only editing information in one spot but it can be visible in multiple places is amazing. Asana sends out regular product updates, has regular webinars, and much more to ensure users are comfortable and confident in using the platform. <span class="spht">Review collected by and hosted on G2.com.</span></p></div></div><div><div class="l5 mt-2">What do you dislike about Asana?</div><div><p class="formatted-text">There isn't really anything I dislike about Asana. <span class="spht">Review collected by and hosted on G2.com.</span></p></div></div><div class="expanded-review-9917037 is-hidden-default"><div class="l5 mt-2">What problems is Asana solving and how is that benefiting you?</div><div><p class="formatted-text">Asana specifically allows my team to have important task and project information consolidated into a single source of truth. It helps maintain transparency and communication among a team that is not always able to collaborate in office together. It helps us share information with other teams and control who has the ability to edit information vs. comment and I don't have to worry about people making changes. The audit log also helps keep track of who made changes and what those changes were. <span class="spht">Review collected by and hosted on G2.com.</span></p></div></div></div><div class="flex justify-between"><a class="link d-f ai-c x-show-more js-log-click" ue="toggle-class login-modal-toggle" data-toggle-class-targets=".expanded-review-9917037" data-toggle-class-value="is-hidden-default" role="presentation"><path d="M13.333 0L6.667 6.667l-4-4L0 5.333 6.667 12 16 2.667z"></path></svg></div></div><div class="tag" data-container="body" title="Organic review. This review was written entirely without invitation or incentive from G2, a seller, or an affiliate." ue="tooltip">Review source: Organic</div></div></div><div class="paper__bd"><div class="d-f mb-1"><div class="f-1 d-f ai-c mb-half-small-only"><div class="stars large xlarge--medium-down stars-0"></div><div class="time-stamp pl-4th ws-nw"><span><span class="x-current-review-date" data-poison-date=""><meta content="2024-07-19" itemprop="datePublished"><time datetime="2024-07-19">Jul 19, 2024</time></span></span></div></div></div><div class="d-f"><div class="f-1"><div data-poison=""><a class="pjax" href="https://www.g2.com/products/asana/reviews/asana-review-9906738"><div class="m-0 l2" itemprop="name">"Disturbing Business Practices"</div></a></div><div data-poison-text=""><div itemprop="reviewBody"><div><div class="l5 mt-2">What do you like best about Asana?</div><div><p class="formatted-text">Their Customer Support reponds within 24 hours. <span class="spht">Review collected by and hosted on G2.com.</span></p></div></div><div><div class="l5 mt-2">What do you dislike about Asana?</div><div><p class="formatted-text">I was an Asana User for 3 years utilizing about 20 seats. We recently switched to HubSpot beacuase it met our particular use case. I kept Asana, but reduced the number of seats for about 6 months. When I finally went to cancel my account, I erroneously upgraded instead of cancelled. I instantly contacted customer support and explained the error. They refused to refund the erroneous charge (it had been only 24 hours). 
</p><p class="formatted-text">
</p><p class="formatted-text">From Asana:
</p><p class="formatted-text">I understand how important this matter is to you. However, as per our subscriber agreement, our team has confirmed that we are currently unable to process your refund request. For more details, please review our subscriber agreement for information on our refund policy.
</p><p class="formatted-text"> 
</p><p class="formatted-text">I realize this may not be the outcome you were hoping for, but I am here to assist you in any other way possible. If you have any other concerns or questions, please let me know, and I'll do my best to help.
</p><p class="formatted-text">
</p><p class="formatted-text">Mind you - this was over a $32.90 charge. It will not impact my business of course, but after 3 years and thousands of dollars in subscription fees - Iwould exepct their customer service team to do better. Values matter in 2024, and unfortnately I got a bitter taste of Asana's values. <span class="spht">Review collected by and hosted on G2.com.</span></p></div></div><div class="expanded-review-9906738 is-hidden-default"><div class="l5 mt-2">What problems is Asana solving and how is that benefiting you?</div><div><p class="formatted-text">Asana did not solve a problem for me. <span class="spht">Review collected by and hosted on G2.com.</span></p></div></div></div><div class="flex justify-between"><a class="link d-f ai-c x-show-more js-log-click" ue="toggle-class class="d-f ai-c">Validated Reviewer<svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" contain="paint" buffered-rendering="static" viewBox="0 0 16 12" class="c-teal-100 tiny ml-half icon-checkmark-thick xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" contain="paint" buffered-rendering="static" viewBox="0 0 16 12" class="c-teal-100 tiny ml-half icon-checkmark-thick nessy-only" aria-hidden="true" focusable="false" role="presentation"><path d="M13.333 0L6.667 6.667l-4-4L0 5.333 6.667 12 16 2.667z"></path></svg></div></div><div class="tag" data-container="body" title="Invitation from G2. This reviewer was offered a nominal gift card as thank you for completing this review." ue="tooltip">Review source: G2 invite</div><div class="tag" title="This reviewer was offered a nominal gift card as thank you for completing this review." ue="tooltip">Incentivized Review</div></div></div><div class="paper__bd"><div class="d-f mb-1"><div class="f-1 d-f ai-c mb-half-small-only"><div class="stars large xlarge--medium-down stars-10"></div><div class="time-stamp pl-4th ws-nw"><span><span class="x-current-review-date" data-poison-date=""><meta content="2024-07-03" itemprop="datePublished"><time datetime="2024-07-03">Jul 03, 2024</time></span></span></div></div></div><div class="d-f"><div class="f-1"><div data-poison=""><a class="pjax" href="https://www.g2.com/products/asana/reviews/asana-review-9858997"><div class="m-0 l2" itemprop="name">"Asana is great for team visibility and easier project mangement"</div></a></div><div data-poison-text=""><div itemprop="reviewBody"><div><div class="l5 mt-2">What do you like best about Asana?</div><div><p class="formatted-text">Asana is useful for anyone like individual or team, who wants a visual approch to keep track of forthcoming tasks. It is ideal for teams who need to be able to see what other huge projects their colleagues are working on. They provide best customer services. I would not expect it to be really useful if you need a lot of visual details for a certain activity. <span class="spht">Review collected by and hosted on G2.com.</span></p></div></div><div><div class="l5 mt-2">What do you dislike about Asana?</div><div><p class="formatted-text">Overall, Asana is fantastic, but the description and team are always visible, but the description and team are always visible, but previous work is not. For example, in a creative team, I can see the delivery but not the previous copy or design work, only that it is finished. <span class="spht">Review collected by and hosted on G2.com.</span></p></div></div><div class="expanded-review-9858997 is-hidden-default"><div class="l5 mt-2">What problems is Asana solving and how is that benefiting you?</div><div><p class="formatted-text">Asana is used across different departments. My departments use Asana to organize all of their work and cooperate on projects with other departments. It allows us to manage deadlines and obligations in order to complete the project on time. We also keep track of fresh ideas so that we have a record to refer back to. Without tracking, projects risk being forgotten as new priorities emerge. Asana keeps them alive. <span class="spht">Review collected by and hosted on G2.com.</span></p></div></div></div><div class="flex justify-between"><a class="link d-f ai-c x-show-more js-log-click" class="tag" title="The reviewer uploaded a screenshot or submitted the review in-app verifying them as current user." ue="tooltip"><div class="d-f ai-c">Verified Current User<svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" contain="paint" buffered-rendering="static" viewBox="0 0 16 12" class="c-teal-100 tiny ml-half icon-checkmark-thick nessy-only" aria-hidden="true" focusable="false" role="presentation"><path d="M13.333 0L6.667 6.667l-4-4L0 5.333 6.667 12 16 2.667z"></path></svg></div></div><div class="tag" data-container="body" title="Invitation from G2. This reviewer was offered a nominal gift card as thank you for completing this review." ue="tooltip">Review source: G2 invite</div><div class="tag" title="This reviewer was offered a nominal gift card as thank you for completing this review." ue="tooltip">Incentivized Review</div></div></div><div class="paper__bd"><div class="d-f mb-1"><div class="f-1 d-f ai-c mb-half-small-only"><div class="stars large xlarge--medium-down stars-10"></div><div class="time-stamp pl-4th ws-nw"><span><span class="x-current-review-date" data-poison-date=""><meta content="2024-07-03" itemprop="datePublished"><time datetime="2024-07-03">Jul 03, 2024</time></span></span></div></div></div><div class="d-f"><div class="f-1"><div data-poison=""><a class="pjax" href="https://www.g2.com/products/asana/reviews/asana-review-9858869"><div class="m-0 l2" itemprop="name">"Great for project management"</div></a></div><div data-poison-text=""><div itemprop="reviewBody"><div><div class="l5 mt-2">What do you like best about Asana?</div><div><p class="formatted-text">Asana is excellent for managing a project involving multiple workers. It provides the team with increased visibility by displaying updates and working on a single thread. Asana is excellent for straightforward project management. Some advanced project management applications, such as Gantt charts, need paid subscriptions, however Asana excels at establishing and keeping classified task lists, as well as allocating tasks to specific individuals. <span class="spht">Review collected by and hosted on G2.com.</span></p></div></div><div><div class="l5 mt-2">What do you dislike about Asana?</div><div><p class="formatted-text">I have never found my tasks, Asana's  to-do list, to be especially useful. I would like to see an option to manually priortize the items on the to-do list. Asana provides a variety of icons for project connections, but it would be useful to add unique icons. <span class="spht">Review collected by and hosted on G2.com.</span></p></div></div><div class="expanded-review-9858869 is-hidden-default"><div class="l5 mt-2">What problems is Asana solving and how is that benefiting you?</div><div><p class="formatted-text">We use Asana to keep organized in our marketing department. Specifically, our design team uses it to manage all asset requests, which allows us to see not only who is working on the asset, but also what the entire team is working on. Asana helps us to save time in meetings and reduce email communication. Team members are assigned opportunities and must undertake due diligence before deciding whether to persue them. <span class="spht">Review collected by and hosted on G2.com.</span></p></div></div></div><div class="flex justify-between"><a class="link d-f ai-c x-show-more js-log-click" ue="toggle-class login-modal-toggle" This reviewer was not provided any incentive by G2 for completing this review." ue="tooltip">Review source: Seller invite</div></div></div><div class="paper__bd"><div class="d-f mb-1"><div class="f-1 d-f ai-c mb-half-small-only"><div class="stars large xlarge--medium-down stars-10"></div><div class="time-stamp pl-4th ws-nw"><span><span class="x-current-review-date" data-poison-date=""><meta content="2024-07-16" itemprop="datePublished"><time datetime="2024-07-16">Jul 16, 2024</time></span></span></div></div></div><div class="d-f"><div class="f-1"><div class="callout warning">Guest users or non-business users of the software, not included in G2 scores.</div><div data-poison=""><a class="pjax" href="https://www.g2.com/products/asana/reviews/asana-review-9894603"><div class="m-0 l2" itemprop="name">"Asana newbie - 100% hooked"</div></a></div><div data-poison-text=""><div itemprop="reviewBody"><div><div class="l5 mt-2">What do you like best about Asana?</div><div><p class="formatted-text">I work remotely, but it no longer feels like it with Asana. The customer support is great and I feel much more connected to the team. 
</p><p class="formatted-text">
</p><p class="formatted-text">I'm finding it super easy to implement into my workflows, both personally and with the team. I use it everyday and so am learning quickly while working. 
</p><p class="formatted-text">
</p><p class="formatted-text">I'm yet to find anything it can't do! <span class="spht">Review collected by and hosted on G2.com.</span></p></div></div><div><div class="l5 mt-2">What do you dislike about Asana?</div><div><p class="formatted-text">I thought about this long and hard, but I've definitely not found anything I dislike yet! <span class="spht">Review collected by and hosted on G2.com.</span></p></div></div><div class="expanded-review-9894603 is-hidden-default"><div class="l5 mt-2">What problems is Asana solving and how is that benefiting you?</div><div><p class="formatted-text">Asana is connecting multiple teams accross multiple offices with Freelancers on a project that involves multiple stakeholder groups. This is meaning my role comunicating between various groups to deliver a large project planned accross 18 months is going to be so much easier and time effective. No more complicated email filing systems or sharing files in Dropbox, OneDrive...I feel refreshed and happy to plan forward! <span class="spht">Review collected by and hosted on G2.com.</span></p></div></div></div><div class="flex justify-between"><a class="link d-f ai-c x-show-more js-log-click" ue="toggle-class login-modal-toggle" role="presentation"><path d="M13.333 0L6.667 6.667l-4-4L0 5.333 6.667 12 16 2.667z"></path></svg></div></div><div class="tag" data-container="body" title="Invitation from G2. This reviewer was offered a nominal gift card as thank you for completing this review." ue="tooltip">Review source: G2 invite</div><div class="tag" title="This reviewer was offered a nominal gift card as thank you for completing this review." ue="tooltip">Incentivized Review</div></div></div><div class="paper__bd"><div class="d-f mb-1"><div class="f-1 d-f ai-c mb-half-small-only"><div class="stars large xlarge--medium-down stars-10"></div><div class="time-stamp pl-4th ws-nw"><span><span class="x-current-review-date" data-poison-date=""><meta content="2024-06-27" itemprop="datePublished"><time datetime="2024-06-27">Jun 27, 2024</time></span></span></div></div></div><div class="d-f"><div class="f-1"><div data-poison=""><a class="pjax" href="https://www.g2.com/products/asana/reviews/asana-review-9838645"><div class="m-0 l2" itemprop="name">"Wonderful and easy to use project management tool packed to the brim with useful features"</div></a></div><div data-poison-text=""><div itemprop="reviewBody"><div><div class="l5 mt-2">What do you like best about Asana?</div><div><p class="formatted-text">Asana is used primarily for project management, task management, and vendor management. It is employed throughout the company in various segments. It focuses on the scheduling, tracking, and administration of activities for significant projects. This is the ultimate tool for productive communication and teamwork. To improve teamwork, each project inculudes group chat, delivery timelines, to-do lists, and file storage.They provide best customer support. <span class="spht">Review collected by and hosted on G2.com.</span></p></div></div><div><div class="l5 mt-2">What do you dislike about Asana?</div><div><p class="formatted-text">Notifications can be more customizable. I would like to recieve notifications for tasks shared with me, but not for tasks in my workspace. When attempting to transfer numerous tasks, it may get laggy. <span class="spht">Review collected by and hosted on G2.com.</span></p></div></div><div class="expanded-review-9838645 is-hidden-default"><div class="l5 mt-2">What problems is Asana solving and how is that benefiting you?</div><div><p class="formatted-text">We utilize Asana widely throughout our organization. The Product &amp; Enginering team uses it to handle bi-weekly sprints and backlog projects for each of our sites. The Finance and HR team employes templated projects to onboard and offboard workers. The marketing and design teams utilize it to collaborate on client projects. The best part about Asana is how quickly and eagerly everyone began to use it <span class="spht">Review collected by and hosted on G2.com.</span></p></div></div></div><div class="flex class="simple-menu" data-simple-menu-on-hover="1" ue="simple-menu"><a class="simple-menu__anchor"><svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" contain="paint" buffered-rendering="static" viewBox="0 0 512 0 50 22 50 48 0 27-22 48-50 48zm142 0c-27 0-50-21-50-48 0-26 23-48 50-48 28 0 50 22 50 48 0 27-22 48-50 48z"></path></svg></a><ul aria-hidden="true" class="simple-menu__body simple-menu__body--plain py-4th"><li><a data-login-modal-toggle-allow-untrusted-user="true" data-event-click-target="concerns#new" class="c-midnight-100 action-bar__button text-lg ws-nw pl-half" ue=" login-modal-toggle" href="https://www.g2.com/survey_responses/9832175/concerns/new">Report a Concern</a></li><li data-product-admin-class-name="is-hidden-default" data-product-admin-id="278" data-product-admin-model="Product" data-ue-widget="product-admin"><a data-login-modal-toggle-allow-untrusted-user="true" data-event-click-target="official_responses#new" class="c-midnight-100 ai-c">Validated Reviewer<svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" contain="paint" buffered-rendering="static" viewBox="0 0 16 12" class="c-teal-100 tiny ml-half icon-checkmark-thick nessy-only" aria-hidden="true" focusable="false" role="presentation"><path d="M13.333 0L6.667 6.667l-4-4L0 5.333 6.667 12 16 2.667z"></path></svg></div></div><div alt="Validated Asana Screenshot" class="tag" title="The reviewer uploaded a screenshot or submitted the review in-app verifying them as current user." ue="tooltip"><div class="d-f ai-c">Verified Current User<svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" contain="paint" buffered-rendering="static" viewBox="0 0 16 12" class="c-teal-100 tiny ml-half icon-checkmark-thick nessy-only" aria-hidden="true" focusable="false" role="presentation"><path d="M13.333 0L6.667 6.667l-4-4L0 5.333 6.667 12 16 2.667z"></path></svg></div></div><div class="tag" data-container="body" title="Invitation from a seller or affiliate. This reviewer was offered a nominal incentive as thanks for completing this review." ue="tooltip">Review source: Seller invite</div><div class="tag" title="This reviewer was offered a nominal incentive as thanks for completing this review." ue="tooltip">Incentivized Review</div></div></div><div class="paper__bd"><div class="d-f mb-1"><div class="f-1 d-f ai-c mb-half-small-only"><div class="stars large xlarge--medium-down stars-10"></div><div class="time-stamp pl-4th ws-nw"><span><span class="x-current-review-date" data-poison-date=""><meta content="2024-06-25" itemprop="datePublished"><time datetime="2024-06-25">Jun 25, 2024</time></span></span></div></div></div><div class="d-f"><div class="f-1"><div data-poison=""><a class="pjax" href="https://www.g2.com/products/asana/reviews/asana-review-9832175"><div class="m-0 l2" itemprop="name">"Asana ensures I have my sh*t together."</div></a></div><div data-poison-text=""><div itemprop="reviewBody"><div><div class="l5 mt-2">What do you like best about Asana?</div><div><p class="formatted-text">Asana is one of the most user friendly project management platforms I have ever used. But it still has so many tailored features that allow you to bend and mold the program to your liking. Using this tool allows me to keep my team on task and aligned with goals  without having to chase them down. I can also see each team members current scope of work. I use Asana everyday, and without it, my ADHD would have me dropping all of my spinning plates. <span class="spht">Review collected by and hosted on G2.com.</span></p></div></div><div><div class="l5 mt-2">What do you dislike about Asana?</div><div><p class="formatted-text">Not necesarrily a dislike persay. However, I would like to have smart, reocurring task lists. For example, a task list or project list that restarts on the same day every month for reocurring reports, newsletters, or projects of the like. <span class="spht">Review collected by and hosted on G2.com.</span></p></div></div><div class="expanded-review-9832175 is-hidden-default"><div class="l5 mt-2">What problems is Asana solving and how is that benefiting you?</div><div><p class="formatted-text">Asana takes the guess work out of the todo list. It can be hard to come back to work after a trip or even just a rough start to the morning. By understanding exactly where my tasks and my teams project lay, I'm able to jump in and peck away at what would be quite a daunting agenda. <span class="spht">Review collected by and hosted on G2.com.</span></p></div></div></div><div class="flex justify-between"><a class="link d-f ai-c x-show-more js-log-click" ue="toggle-class login-modal-toggle" role="presentation"><path d="M13.333 0L6.667 6.667l-4-4L0 5.333 6.667 12 16 2.667z"></path></svg></div></div><div class="tag" data-container="body" title="Invitation from a seller or affiliate. This reviewer was offered a nominal incentive as thanks for completing this review." ue="tooltip">Review source: Seller invite</div><div class="tag" title="This reviewer was offered a nominal incentive as thanks for completing this review." ue="tooltip">Incentivized Review</div></div></div><div class="paper__bd"><div class="d-f mb-1"><div class="f-1 d-f ai-c mb-half-small-only"><div class="stars large xlarge--medium-down stars-9"></div><div class="time-stamp pl-4th ws-nw"><span><span class="x-current-review-date" data-poison-date=""><meta content="2024-06-25" itemprop="datePublished"><time datetime="2024-06-25">Jun 25, 2024</time></span></span></div></div></div><div class="d-f"><div class="f-1"><div data-poison=""><a class="pjax" href="https://www.g2.com/products/asana/reviews/asana-review-9831486"><div class="m-0 l2" itemprop="name">"Very Robust!"</div></a></div><div data-poison-text=""><div itemprop="reviewBody"><div><div class="l5 mt-2">What do you like best about Asana?</div><div><p class="formatted-text">Asana is a very robust project management tool. It can be used in the most basic fashion (task list) all the way to creating and managing a large project and assigning team mates/co-workers to help. You can assign due dates and specific people to certain tasks and even create dependencies that will trigger other tasks. It easily connects to other apps for integration (I often turn actionable emails into tasks w/in Asana just with a single click). There are a number of articles. videos and additional help through the Asana Academy where you can learn to take advantage of the features offered. <span class="spht">Review collected by and hosted on G2.com.</span></p></div></div><div><div class="l5 mt-2">What do you dislike about Asana?</div><div><p class="formatted-text">It is so feature full, it is difficult to master. <span class="spht">Review collected by and hosted on G2.com.</span></p></div></div><div class="expanded-review-9831486 is-hidden-default"><div class="l5 mt-2">What problems is Asana solving and how is that benefiting you?</div><div><p class="formatted-text">I am juggling many different internal projects and Asana is very helpful to keep me on task and focused on next steps through the task list and collaboration features. I am sure there are additional features that would be beneficial, but I have not learned them all yet. <span class="spht">Review collected by and hosted on G2.com.</span></p></div></div></div><div class="flex justify-between"><a class="link d-f ai-c x-show-more js-log-click" ue="toggle-class login-modal-toggle" data-toggle-class-targets=".expanded-review-9831486" role="presentation"><path d="M13.333 0L6.667 6.667l-4-4L0 5.333 6.667 12 16 2.667z"></path></svg></div></div><div class="tag" data-container="body" title="Invitation from a seller or affiliate. This reviewer was offered a nominal incentive as thanks for completing this review." ue="tooltip">Review source: Seller invite</div><div class="tag" title="This reviewer was offered a nominal incentive as thanks for completing this review." ue="tooltip">Incentivized Review</div></div></div><div class="paper__bd"><div class="d-f mb-1"><div class="f-1 d-f ai-c mb-half-small-only"><div class="stars large xlarge--medium-down stars-10"></div><div class="time-stamp pl-4th ws-nw"><span><span class="x-current-review-date" data-poison-date=""><meta content="2024-06-24" itemprop="datePublished"><time datetime="2024-06-24">Jun 24, 2024</time></span></span></div></div></div><div class="d-f"><div class="f-1"><div class="callout warning">Guest users or non-business users of the software, not included in G2 scores.</div><div data-poison=""><a class="pjax" href="https://www.g2.com/products/asana/reviews/asana-review-9827030"><div class="m-0 l2" itemprop="name">"Asana is FANTASTIC!"</div></a></div><div data-poison-text=""><div itemprop="reviewBody"><div><div class="l5 mt-2">What do you like best about Asana?</div><div><p class="formatted-text">I like the ability to keep track of where I am in a project with Asana, and I like that once I've completed a project, Asana automatically files it as completed.
</p><p class="formatted-text">
</p><p class="formatted-text">It's an easy "to-do" list to use, and it's easy to keep track of all my tasks on it - not just where I'm at in them, but the task itself. If I don't understand something or know how to use something and the bot guy at my company is unavailable, it's been super easy to find the customer support I need on the Asana Forum.
</p><p class="formatted-text">
</p><p class="formatted-text">I use Asana every day of the business week, so it's getting easier and easier to use, and out of all the CRMs I've used, this one has to be my absolute favorite. <span class="spht">Review collected by and hosted on G2.com.</span></p></div></div><div><div class="l5 mt-2">What do you dislike about Asana?</div><div><p class="formatted-text">I'm still learning it, so I'm not sure what I don't like most yet. There's not much I don't like. <span class="spht">Review collected by and hosted on G2.com.</span></p></div></div><div class="expanded-review-9827030 is-hidden-default"><div class="l5 mt-2">What problems is Asana solving and how is that benefiting you?</div><div><p class="formatted-text">It keeps me abreast of my workflow and where I'm at in my projects. I've never found an easier program to use to know where I'm at with a single click, in my tasks for the day, or in the task / project that I'm currently working on. Only Asana's been able to tell me that. <span class="spht">Review collected by and hosted on G2.com.</span></p></div></div></div><div class="flex justify-between"><a class="link d-f ai-c x-show-more js-log-click" ue="toggle-class login-modal-toggle" data-toggle-class-targets=".expanded-review-9827030" data-toggle-class-value="is-hidden-default" data-toggle-class-login-required="true" role="presentation"><path d="M13.333 0L6.667 6.667l-4-4L0 5.333 6.667 12 16 2.667z"></path></svg></div></div><div class="tag" data-container="body" title="Invitation from a seller or affiliate. This reviewer was offered a nominal incentive as thanks for completing this review." ue="tooltip">Review source: Seller invite</div><div class="tag" title="This reviewer was offered a nominal incentive as thanks for completing this review." ue="tooltip">Incentivized Review</div></div></div><div class="paper__bd"><div class="d-f mb-1"><div class="f-1 d-f ai-c mb-half-small-only"><div class="stars large xlarge--medium-down stars-10"></div><div class="time-stamp pl-4th ws-nw"><span><span class="x-current-review-date" data-poison-date=""><meta content="2024-06-23" itemprop="datePublished"><time datetime="2024-06-23">Jun 23, 2024</time></span></span></div></div></div><div class="d-f"><div class="f-1"><div data-poison=""><a class="pjax" href="https://www.g2.com/products/asana/reviews/asana-review-9823432"><div class="m-0 l2" itemprop="name">"A Game-Changer for Managing Creative Projects"</div></a></div><div data-poison-text=""><div itemprop="reviewBody"><div><div class="l5 mt-2">What do you like best about Asana?</div><div><p class="formatted-text">What I like best about Asana is its ability to streamline project management and enhance team collaboration. As a small business owner working with creative clients, Asana's user-friendly interface and robust task management system allow me to break down large projects into manageable tasks, set clear deadlines, and assign responsibilities to subcontractors effectively. The seamless integration with other tools and the customizable workflows have significantly boosted our efficiency. Asana's real-time updates and communication features keep everyone on the same page, ensuring that we consistently meet our deadlines and deliver high-quality service to our clients. <span class="spht">Review collected by and hosted on G2.com.</span></p></div></div><div><div class="l5 mt-2">What do you dislike about Asana?</div><div><p class="formatted-text">I wish I could get premium features for my one woman show. <span class="spht">Review collected by and hosted on G2.com.</span></p></div></div><div class="expanded-review-9823432 is-hidden-default"><div class="l5 mt-2">What problems is Asana solving and how is that benefiting you?</div><div><p class="formatted-text">Asana solves several critical problems for my small business, primarily in the areas of project organization, deadline management, and team collaboration. Before Asana, keeping track of multiple projects and ensuring timely completion was challenging. Asana's robust task management system allows us to break down projects into manageable tasks, assign them to the appropriate team members, and set clear deadlines. This structure ensures that nothing falls through the cracks and that all tasks are completed on time. <span class="spht">Review collected by and hosted on G2.com.</span></p></div></div></div><div This review was written entirely without invitation or incentive from G2, a seller, or an affiliate." ue="tooltip">Review source: Organic</div></div></div><div class="paper__bd"><div class="d-f mb-1"><div class="f-1 d-f ai-c mb-half-small-only"><div class="stars large xlarge--medium-down stars-9"></div><div class="time-stamp pl-4th ws-nw"><span><span class="x-current-review-date" data-poison-date=""><meta content="2024-06-25" itemprop="datePublished"><time datetime="2024-06-25">Jun 25, 2024</time></span></span></div></div></div><div class="d-f"><div class="f-1"><div class="callout warning">Guest users or non-business users of the software, not included in G2 scores.</div><div data-poison=""><a class="pjax" href="https://www.g2.com/products/asana/reviews/asana-review-9833044"><div class="m-0 l2" itemprop="name">"Been using it for over 10 years, no complaints"</div></a></div><div data-poison-text=""><div itemprop="reviewBody"><div><div class="l5 mt-2">What do you like best about Asana?</div><div><p class="formatted-text">- Clean and intuitive interface
</p><p class="formatted-text">- Strong task management features
</p><p class="formatted-text">- Extensive integrations (Slack, Google Drive, Microsoft Teams, etc.)
</p><p class="formatted-text">
</p><p class="formatted-text">I can go on forever but there's not enough space. This straightforward blog can help if you need more information: https://mycloudcrew.com/asana-vs-monday-comparing-project-management-tools-in-2024/ <span class="spht">Review collected by and hosted on G2.com.</span></p></div></div><div><div class="l5 mt-2">What do you dislike about Asana?</div><div><p class="formatted-text">- Offers less customization in terms of workflows and project views
</p><p class="formatted-text">- Can become expensive for larger teams that need advanced features <span class="spht">Review collected by and hosted on G2.com.</span></p></div></div><div class="expanded-review-9833044 is-hidden-default"><div class="l5 mt-2">What problems is Asana solving and how is that benefiting you?</div><div><p class="formatted-text">Helps me easily create tasks, assign them to team members, set due dates, and add subtasks. It supports various task views, including list, board, timeline, and calendar views. All of this simplifies everything for me vs. my old way of doing things (pen and paper). I love how once I complete a task, it's put away but still "there" to remind me of what's been done. With some apps, I need to scroll further down or go to another tab for all my "done" tasks. <span class="spht">Review collected by and hosted on G2.com.</span></p></div></div></div><div class="flex justify-between"><a class="link d-f ai-c x-show-more js-log-click" ue="toggle-class login-modal-toggle" data-toggle-class-targets=".expanded-review-9833044" data-toggle-class-value="is-hidden-default" role="presentation"><path d="M13.333 0L6.667 6.667l-4-4L0 5.333 6.667 12 16 2.667z"></path></svg></div></div><div class="tag" data-container="body" title="Invitation from a seller or affiliate. This reviewer was offered a nominal incentive as thanks for completing this review." ue="tooltip">Review source: Seller invite</div><div class="tag" title="This reviewer was offered a nominal incentive as thanks for completing this review." ue="tooltip">Incentivized Review</div></div></div><div class="paper__bd"><div class="d-f mb-1"><div class="f-1 d-f ai-c mb-half-small-only"><div class="stars large xlarge--medium-down stars-10"></div><div class="time-stamp pl-4th ws-nw"><span><span class="x-current-review-date" data-poison-date=""><meta content="2024-07-24" itemprop="datePublished"><time datetime="2024-07-24">Jul 24, 2024</time></span></span></div></div></div><div class="d-f"><div class="f-1"><div data-poison=""><a class="pjax" href="https://www.g2.com/products/asana/reviews/asana-review-9918780"><div class="m-0 l2" itemprop="name">"Asana has increased the worth of our business"</div></a></div><div data-poison-text=""><div itemprop="reviewBody"><div><div class="l5 mt-2">What do you like best about Asana?</div><div><p class="formatted-text">Asana is the perfect system to customise to meet your unique business needs. My team communicates effectively, due dates are set, and work is done in a streamlined manner. 
</p><p class="formatted-text">
</p><p class="formatted-text">It has gamified our business and we LOVE it and use it all day long, every day of the week. <span class="spht">Review collected by and hosted on G2.com.</span></p></div></div><div><div class="l5 mt-2">What do you dislike about Asana?</div><div><p class="formatted-text">Asana is quite costly for newer businesses, but definitely worth every penny if you deep dive and use the program to its max. 
</p><p class="formatted-text">
</p><p class="formatted-text">The rules are difficult to track and fix because the filing system for the rules is quite clunky. <span class="spht">Review collected by and hosted on G2.com.</span></p></div></div><div class="expanded-review-9918780 is-hidden-default"><div class="l5 mt-2">What problems is Asana solving and how is that benefiting you?</div><div><p class="formatted-text">Asana has streamlined my content creation department, sales department, finances, product delivery.... everything. 
</p><p class="formatted-text">
</p><p class="formatted-text">We are fully integrated into asana to run our entire business and we even use it as a filing system.
</p><p class="formatted-text">
</p><p class="formatted-text">The best part about asana is the detailed analytics dashboard. <span class="spht">Review collected by and hosted on G2.com.</span></p></div></div></div><div class="flex xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" contain="paint" buffered-rendering="static" viewBox="0 0 16 12" class="c-teal-100 tiny ml-half icon-checkmark-thick nessy-only" aria-hidden="true" focusable="false" role="presentation"><path d="M13.333 0L6.667 6.667l-4-4L0 5.333 6.667 12 16 2.667z"></path></svg></div></div><div class="tag" data-container="body" title="Invitation from a seller or affiliate. This reviewer was offered a nominal incentive as thanks for completing this review." ue="tooltip">Review source: Seller invite</div><div class="tag" title="This reviewer was offered a nominal incentive as thanks for completing this review." ue="tooltip">Incentivized Review</div></div></div><div class="paper__bd"><div class="d-f mb-1"><div class="f-1 d-f ai-c mb-half-small-only"><div class="stars large xlarge--medium-down stars-10"></div><div class="time-stamp pl-4th ws-nw"><span><span class="x-current-review-date" data-poison-date=""><meta content="2024-06-13" itemprop="datePublished"><time datetime="2024-06-13">Jun 13, 2024</time></span></span></div></div></div><div class="d-f"><div class="f-1"><div data-poison=""><a class="pjax" href="https://www.g2.com/products/asana/reviews/asana-review-9785763"><div class="m-0 l2" itemprop="name">"Perfect for Remote Assistants"</div></a></div><div data-poison-text=""><div itemprop="reviewBody"><div><div class="l5 mt-2">What do you like best about Asana?</div><div><p class="formatted-text">I am a lawyer, sole-practitioner who does trial work.  I accept work on a case-by-case basis.  I lost my long-time assistant and in searching for a replacement I only needed a part-time person and they could be remote.  However it is hard to monitor what is going on and what needs to be done when I have many pending cases.  I looked and researched and tried Asana.  It was a good choice.  I don't use most of what Asana can do. But every time I open a case, I open it as a project and put in calendar dates and then tasks for me and my assistant.  While I do the same, she gets her tasks and marks them as complete.  I can keep up with everything my assistant is doing or has done.  It is perfect for me. <span class="spht">Review collected by and hosted on G2.com.</span></p></div></div><div><div class="l5 mt-2">What do you dislike about Asana?</div><div><p class="formatted-text">I have not found a downside to Asana, but my requirements are not very demanding. <span class="spht">Review collected by and hosted on G2.com.</span></p></div></div><div class="expanded-review-9785763 is-hidden-default"><div class="l5 mt-2">What problems is Asana solving and how is that benefiting you?</div><div><p class="formatted-text">Asana solves the problem of remotely communicating tasks and keeping up with when they are completed. <span class="spht">Review collected by and hosted on G2.com.</span></p></div></div></div><div class="flex justify-between"><a class="link d-f ai-c x-show-more js-log-click" ue="toggle-class login-modal-toggle" data-toggle-class-targets=".expanded-review-9785763" data-toggle-class-value="is-hidden-default" data-toggle-class-login-required="true" data-login-modal-toggle-allow-untrusted-user="true" data-login-and-return="true" data-login-anchor="survey-response-9785763" data-event-options="{&quot;product_id&quot;:278,&quot;product_uuid&quot;:&quot;ababe6c4-cb0d-4e1c-9416-6d554f3dd3ff&quot;,&quot;product&quot;:&quot;Asana&quot;,&quot;vendor_id&quot;:243,&quot;product_type&quot;:&quot;Software&quot;,&quot;name&quot;:&quot;Event::Products::Reviews::ReadMore&quot;}" href="#survey-response-9785763"><div class="expanded-review-9785763">Show More<svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" contain="paint" buffered-rendering="static" viewBox="0 0 10 10" class="expanded-review-9785763 is-hidden-default">Show Less<svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" contain="paint" buffered-rendering="static" viewBox="0 0 10 10" class="revealer-chevron-less role="presentation"><path d="M13.333 0L6.667 6.667l-4-4L0 5.333 6.667 12 16 2.667z"></path></svg></div></div><div class="tag" data-container="body" title="Invitation from a seller or affiliate. This reviewer was offered a nominal incentive as thanks for completing this review." ue="tooltip">Review source: Seller invite</div><div class="tag" title="This reviewer was offered a nominal incentive as thanks for completing this review." ue="tooltip">Incentivized Review</div></div></div><div class="paper__bd"><div class="d-f mb-1"><div class="f-1 d-f ai-c mb-half-small-only"><div class="stars large xlarge--medium-down stars-10"></div><div class="time-stamp pl-4th ws-nw"><span><span class="x-current-review-date" data-poison-date=""><meta content="2024-06-13" itemprop="datePublished"><time datetime="2024-06-13">Jun 13, 2024</time></span></span></div></div></div><div class="d-f"><div class="f-1"><div data-poison=""><a class="pjax" href="https://www.g2.com/products/asana/reviews/asana-review-9785180"><div class="m-0 l2" itemprop="name">"The Best Tool for Staying Organized"</div></a></div><div data-poison-text=""><div itemprop="reviewBody"><div><div class="l5 mt-2">What do you like best about Asana?</div><div><p class="formatted-text">Asana has been integral in managing my to-do list, my projects, and communicating with my team on projects. Getting notified of upcoming deadlines has helped me stay on track and complete tasks on time. <span class="spht">Review collected by and hosted on G2.com.</span></p></div></div><div><div class="l5 mt-2">What do you dislike about Asana?</div><div><p class="formatted-text">I have not found anything that I dislike about Asana yet, and I've been using it for about 8 years now. <span class="spht">Review collected by and hosted on G2.com.</span></p></div></div><div class="expanded-review-9785180 is-hidden-default"><div class="l5 mt-2">What problems is Asana solving and how is that benefiting you?</div><div><p class="formatted-text">We have team members who live in  different states, but we need to communicate about ongoing projects. Asana has helped us all stay in communication about our blogs, it has allowed us to stay organized and hit deadlines. I simply set up our blog calendar each month and then set up subtasks for each team member and assign due dates. We keep all of our communication within Asana so it's all in one place rather than having several email chains going about several different blogs. We can now see at which stage each blog is in easily. <span class="spht">Review collected by and hosted on G2.com.</span></p></div></div></div><div class="flex justify-between"><a class="link d-f ai-c role="presentation"><path d="M13.333 0L6.667 6.667l-4-4L0 5.333 6.667 12 16 2.667z"></path></svg></div></div><div class="tag" data-container="body" title="Invitation from a seller or affiliate. This reviewer was offered a nominal incentive as thanks for completing this review." ue="tooltip">Review source: Seller invite</div><div class="tag" title="This reviewer was offered a nominal incentive as thanks for completing this review." ue="tooltip">Incentivized Review</div></div></div><div class="paper__bd"><div class="d-f mb-1"><div class="f-1 d-f ai-c mb-half-small-only"><div class="stars large xlarge--medium-down stars-10"></div><div class="time-stamp pl-4th ws-nw"><span><span class="x-current-review-date" data-poison-date=""><meta content="2024-06-13" itemprop="datePublished"><time datetime="2024-06-13">Jun 13, 2024</time></span></span></div></div></div><div class="d-f"><div class="f-1"><div data-poison=""><a class="pjax" href="https://www.g2.com/products/asana/reviews/asana-review-9783790"><div class="m-0 l2" itemprop="name">"Game changer for organization!"</div></a></div><div data-poison-text=""><div itemprop="reviewBody"><div><div class="l5 mt-2">What do you like best about Asana?</div><div><p class="formatted-text">Asana has helped our organization be more efficient and productive with our time.  We spend less time searching for things because we have it organized in projects for each of our teams.  With the due date feature, we are able to stay on track with what needs to be accomplished.  We also have more visibility into what are teams are up to, how work is progressing, and when we need to step in and help get something to the finish line.  The ability for our employees to collaborate is also a major benefit.  It's all organized into one location - no more conversations hidden in private chats!  I also love that they are constantly providing updates and rolling out new and useful features. <span class="spht">Review collected by and hosted on G2.com.</span></p></div></div><div><div class="l5 mt-2">What do you dislike about Asana?</div><div><p class="formatted-text">I do wish it was a little more affordable for small businesses.  However, we are still going to pay for it. <span class="spht">Review collected by and hosted on G2.com.</span></p></div></div><div class="expanded-review-9783790 is-hidden-default"><div class="l5 mt-2">What problems is Asana solving and how is that benefiting you?</div><div><p class="formatted-text">The biggest problem we had before is work being in too many places and not always having the visibility we needed to get work done. <span class="spht">Review collected by and hosted on G2.com.</span></p></div></div></div><div class="flex justify-between"><a class="link d-f ai-c x-show-more class="d-f ai-c">Validated Reviewer<svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" contain="paint" buffered-rendering="static" viewBox="0 0 16 12" class="c-teal-100 tiny ml-half icon-checkmark-thick xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" contain="paint" buffered-rendering="static" viewBox="0 0 16 12" class="c-teal-100 tiny ml-half icon-checkmark-thick nessy-only" aria-hidden="true" focusable="false" role="presentation"><path d="M13.333 0L6.667 6.667l-4-4L0 5.333 6.667 12 16 2.667z"></path></svg></div></div><div class="tag" data-container="body" title="Invitation from a seller or affiliate. This reviewer was offered a nominal incentive as thanks for completing this review." ue="tooltip">Review source: Seller invite</div><div class="tag" title="This reviewer was offered a nominal incentive as thanks for completing this review." ue="tooltip">Incentivized Review</div></div></div><div class="paper__bd"><div class="d-f mb-1"><div class="f-1 d-f ai-c mb-half-small-only"><div class="stars large xlarge--medium-down stars-10"></div><div class="time-stamp pl-4th ws-nw"><span><span class="x-current-review-date" data-poison-date=""><meta content="2024-06-12" itemprop="datePublished"><time datetime="2024-06-12">Jun 12, 2024</time></span></span></div></div></div><div class="d-f"><div class="f-1"><div data-poison=""><a class="pjax" href="https://www.g2.com/products/asana/reviews/asana-review-9783724"><div class="m-0 l2" itemprop="name">"Returning to Asana after a 7 year break"</div></a></div><div data-poison-text=""><div itemprop="reviewBody"><div><div class="l5 mt-2">What do you like best about Asana?</div><div><p class="formatted-text">Newly returning to Asana after a 7 year break, has shown me I should never have given up on Asana. I was feeling overwhelmed by the amount of tasks, projects and to do and Asana has been  a great way to manage these and ease of implementing Asana and using the boards was not only fun but incredibly helpful to me. Currently I am using Asana most days and am trying to encourage my team to start using Asana too <span class="spht">Review collected by and hosted on G2.com.</span></p></div></div><div><div class="l5 mt-2">What do you dislike about Asana?</div><div><p class="formatted-text">What do I dislike about Asana? At present it's that I am not using Asana to its fully capablity and my team are yet to fully "jump on board" with Asana. <span class="spht">Review collected by and hosted on G2.com.</span></p></div></div><div class="expanded-review-9783724 is-hidden-default"><div class="l5 mt-2">What problems is Asana solving and how is that benefiting you?</div><div><p class="formatted-text">Asana has been a singular place to capture all of my to do's, projects, tasks and we have just recently statement to run our weekly accounts reporting through Asana. The benefit to me has been my sense of anxiety of forgetting "things" is reducing. <span class="spht">Review collected by and hosted on G2.com.</span></p></div></div></div><div class="flex justify-between"><a class="link d-f ai-c x-show-more js-log-click" ue="toggle-class login-modal-toggle" data-toggle-class-targets=".expanded-review-9783724" data-toggle-class-value="is-hidden-default"
