py-4th"><li><a data-login-modal-toggle-allow-untrusted-user="true" data-event-click-target="concerns#new" class="c-midnight-100 action-bar__button text-lg ws-nw pl-half" ue=" login-modal-toggle" href="https://www.g2.com/survey_responses/9777406/concerns/new">Report a Concern</a></li><li data-product-admin-class-name="is-hidden-default" data-product-admin-id="278" data-product-admin-model="Product" data-ue-widget="product-admin"><a data-login-modal-toggle-allow-untrusted-user="true" data-event-click-target="official_responses#new" class="c-midnight-100 action-bar__button text-lg ws-nw pl-half" ue=" login-modal-toggle" href="https://www.g2.com/survey_responses/asana-review-9777406/official_response/new"><span>Respond as Asana</span></a></li></ul></div></div></div></div><div class="tags--teal"><div alt="Validated Asana Reviewer" class="tag" title="Validated through a business email account" ue="tooltip"><div class="d-f ai-c">Validated Reviewer<svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" contain="paint" buffered-rendering="static" viewBox="0 0 16 12" class="c-teal-100 tiny ml-half icon-checkmark-thick nessy-only" aria-hidden="true" focusable="false" role="presentation"><path d="M13.333 0L6.667 6.667l-4-4L0 5.333 6.667 12 16 2.667z"></path></svg></div></div><div alt="Validated Asana Screenshot" class="tag" title="The reviewer uploaded a screenshot or submitted the review in-app verifying them as current user." ue="tooltip"><div class="d-f ai-c">Verified Current User<svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" contain="paint" buffered-rendering="static" viewBox="0 0 16 12" class="c-teal-100 tiny ml-half icon-checkmark-thick nessy-only" aria-hidden="true" focusable="false" role="presentation"><path d="M13.333 0L6.667 6.667l-4-4L0 5.333 6.667 12 16 2.667z"></path></svg></div></div><div class="tag" data-container="body" title="Invitation from a seller or affiliate. This reviewer was offered a nominal incentive as thanks for completing this review." ue="tooltip">Review source: Seller invite</div><div class="tag" title="This reviewer was offered a nominal incentive as thanks for completing this review." ue="tooltip">Incentivized Review</div></div></div><div class="paper__bd"><div class="d-f mb-1"><div class="f-1 d-f ai-c mb-half-small-only"><div class="stars large xlarge--medium-down stars-8"></div><div class="time-stamp pl-4th ws-nw"><span><span class="x-current-review-date" data-poison-date=""><meta content="2024-06-11" itemprop="datePublished"><time datetime="2024-06-11">Jun 11, 2024</time></span></span></div></div></div><div class="d-f"><div class="f-1"><div data-poison=""><a class="pjax" href="https://www.g2.com/products/asana/reviews/asana-review-9777406"><div class="m-0 l2" itemprop="name">"Gen X Newbie"</div></a></div><div data-poison-text=""><div itemprop="reviewBody"><div><div class="l5 mt-2">What do you like best about Asana?</div><div><p class="formatted-text">As you can see by the title, I'm almost a Boomer, but not quite. I "designed" my first website back in 2000. It was just a GeoCities drag and drop, but I was the only person I knew who had ever done one at the time. I've added RAM, replaced MacBook Pro screens (not touch screens though), designed on Gimp, etc. Little things. That's my tech background.
</p><p class="formatted-text">
</p><p class="formatted-text">So, that being said, I can see how Asana will be incredibly helpful once I start using it regularly. For the past 2-3 weeks, I've been like a deer in headlights when I log on and then I play ostrich when I log off...without accomplishing much of anything. But now that I have attended the Getting Started and the Personal Productivity online presentations, I feel more confident. I can see how it will help me organize my projects and the rest of my life. And that is what I like best about Asana.
</p><p class="formatted-text">
</p><p class="formatted-text">I am a single mom of two boys who are in college and still need me to coordinate some things for them like doctor's appointments, taxes, and school administrative paperwork. If I had known about Asana when they were young and had baseball, softball, soccer, and football practices and games I needed to manage, I probably would be a different person today. <span class="spht">Review collected by and hosted on G2.com.</span></p></div></div><div><div class="l5 mt-2">What do you dislike about Asana?</div><div><p class="formatted-text">I've only tried working with Asana for the past 2-3 weeks. At this point, I haven't found a downside yet. I do see a steep learning curve for someone like me, and it's a little intimidating. However, Asana Academy has live presentations that seem helpful. I just took the Getting Started and the Personal Productivity sessions today, but I feel much more at ease with the program. It seems intuitive and I may just have to go a little slower than other folks. And since Asana emails the presentations to attendees, I'll be able to review these sessions as often as I need, which I definitely appreciate. <span class="spht">Review collected by and hosted on G2.com.</span></p></div></div><div class="expanded-review-9777406 is-hidden-default"><div class="l5 mt-2">What problems is Asana solving and how is that benefiting you?</div><div><p class="formatted-text">Asana is helping me bundle all of my projects and tasks into one portal and that simplifies everything. My team uses Asana for all project-related communications so I am never looking for a lost email or message. It is all under the proper heading. With emails, that doesn't always happen. Too many times, the subject of an email will have absolutely nothing to do with the email itself.  Because our communications are under the name of the project, I don't have to spend an untold amount of time looking for information. It's all right there. <span class="spht">Review collected by and hosted on G2.com.</span></p></div></div></div><div class="flex justify-between"><a class="link d-f ai-c x-show-more js-log-click" id="icon-label-4170423c509ea64658bb4490157cc550">More Options</title><path d="M114 304c-28 0-50-21-50-48 0-26 22-48 50-48 27 0 50 22 50 48 0 27-23 48-50 48zm142 0c-27 0-50-21-50-48 0-26 23-48 50-48 28 0 50 22 50 48 0 27-22 48-50 48zm142 0c-27 0-50-21-50-48 0-26 23-48 50-48 28 0 50 22 50 48 0 27-22 48-50 48z"></path></svg></a><ul aria-hidden="true" class="simple-menu__body simple-menu__body--plain py-4th"><li><a data-login-modal-toggle-allow-untrusted-user="true" data-event-click-target="concerns#new" class="c-midnight-100 action-bar__button text-lg ws-nw pl-half" ue=" login-modal-toggle" href="https://www.g2.com/survey_responses/9775930/concerns/new">Report a Concern</a></li><li data-product-admin-class-name="is-hidden-default" data-product-admin-id="278" data-product-admin-model="Product" data-ue-widget="product-admin"><a data-login-modal-toggle-allow-untrusted-user="true" data-event-click-target="official_responses#new" class="c-midnight-100 ai-c">Validated Reviewer<svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" contain="paint" buffered-rendering="static" viewBox="0 0 16 12" class="c-teal-100 tiny ml-half icon-checkmark-thick nessy-only" aria-hidden="true" focusable="false" role="presentation"><path d="M13.333 0L6.667 6.667l-4-4L0 5.333 6.667 12 16 2.667z"></path></svg></div></div><div alt="Validated Asana Screenshot" class="tag" title="The reviewer uploaded a screenshot or submitted the review in-app verifying them as current user." ue="tooltip"><div class="d-f ai-c">Verified Current User<svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" contain="paint" buffered-rendering="static" viewBox="0 0 16 12" class="c-teal-100 tiny ml-half icon-checkmark-thick nessy-only" aria-hidden="true" focusable="false" role="presentation"><path d="M13.333 0L6.667 6.667l-4-4L0 5.333 6.667 12 16 2.667z"></path></svg></div></div><div class="tag" data-container="body" title="Invitation from a seller or affiliate. This reviewer was offered a nominal incentive as thanks for completing this review." ue="tooltip">Review source: Seller invite</div><div class="tag" title="This reviewer was offered a nominal incentive as thanks for completing this review." ue="tooltip">Incentivized Review</div></div></div><div class="paper__bd"><div class="d-f mb-1"><div class="f-1 d-f ai-c mb-half-small-only"><div class="stars large xlarge--medium-down stars-10"></div><div class="time-stamp pl-4th ws-nw"><span><span class="x-current-review-date" data-poison-date=""><meta content="2024-06-11" itemprop="datePublished"><time datetime="2024-06-11">Jun 11, 2024</time></span></span></div></div></div><div class="d-f"><div class="f-1"><div data-poison=""><a class="pjax" href="https://www.g2.com/products/asana/reviews/asana-review-9775930"><div class="m-0 l2" itemprop="name">"ðŸ“Everything important, all in one place!"</div></a></div><div data-poison-text=""><div itemprop="reviewBody"><div><div class="l5 mt-2">What do you like best about Asana?</div><div><p class="formatted-text">I throw everything important in my life into my Asana, both work and personal, all in one place. Before Asana I had random to-do lists all over the place (notebooks, personal and professional Google Workspace accounts, etc.) but now I have it all in one easy place. I love navigating back and forth between the different views (mostly list and calendar) so that I make sure nothing falls through the cracks.
</p><p class="formatted-text">
</p><p class="formatted-text">Whenever I have a task that's a repeatable process, I make it a template to use over and over.
</p><p class="formatted-text">
</p><p class="formatted-text">I just started using Asana in Janurary 2024, and my only regret is that I didn't start sooner. <span class="spht">Review collected by and hosted on G2.com.</span></p></div></div><div><div class="l5 mt-2">What do you dislike about Asana?</div><div><p class="formatted-text">Honestly, I love it. No complaints I can think of! <span class="spht">Review collected by and hosted on G2.com.</span></p></div></div><div class="expanded-review-9775930 is-hidden-default"><div class="l5 mt-2">What problems is Asana solving and how is that benefiting you?</div><div><p class="formatted-text">As I document my regular work projects with Asana, I'm creating templates (which, is a lot of work in the beginning). But! It pays off. Now I'm able to do tasks more efficiently and accurately, plus I love the dopamine hit my brain gets each time I check off a task. <span class="spht">Review collected by and hosted on G2.com.</span></p></div></div></div><div class="flex justify-between"><a class="link d-f ai-c x-show-more js-log-click" ue="toggle-class login-modal-toggle" They may not have updated their review text, but have updated their review." aria-labelledby="icon-label-2e5b41a2670a65e77c19fc0651611df4" role="img"><title id="icon-label-2e5b41a2670a65e77c19fc0651611df4">Information</title><path d="M253 20c65 0 120 22 167 67 46 45 70 100 72 165 0 65-22 121-68 167-45 47-100 71-165 73-65 0-121-22-167-68-47-45-71-100-72-165S41 138 87 92c46-47 101-71 166-72m-1 379c10 0 19-3 25-9 6-7 10-15 10-24 0-11-2-19-9-26-6-6-15-9-25-9h-1c-10 0-18 3-24 9-7 6-10 14-11 24 0 10 3 18 10 25 6 6 14 10 24 10h1m85-168c9-11 13-24 13-40 0-26-9-46-27-59s-41-19-69-19c-22 0-40 4-53 13-24 14-36 39-37 75v2h56v-2c0-9 3-18 8-28 6-8 15-12 28-12 14 0 23 3 27 10 5 7 8 14 8 23 0 6-3 13-8 20-3 4-7 8-11 10l-3 2c-2 2-4 4-8 6-3 2-7 5-10 8-4 2-7 5-11 8s-7 6-9 9c-4 7-7 20-9 40v4h56v-2c0-4 0-9 2-14 2-7 6-13 14-19l14-9c16-12 25-20 29-26"></path></svg></span></span></div></div></div><div class="d-f"><div class="f-1"><div data-poison=""><a class="pjax" href="https://www.g2.com/products/asana/reviews/asana-review-4958603"><div class="m-0 l2" itemprop="name">"Get Things Done With Asana"</div></a></div><div data-poison-text=""><div itemprop="reviewBody"><div><div class="l5 mt-2">What do you like best about Asana?</div><div><p class="formatted-text">I use Asana on a daily basis. Asana has multiple features that are helpful and easy to use. I love how they are always adding new features and tools. This is a great platform for collaborating with colleges and clients. Asana can also integrate with apps that you use daily, and the implementation process is easy. The Asana can be used in several different ways, and you can customize your view to fit the type of project you are working on. Asana has a vast library of help documentation, and their customer support is top-notch! <span class="spht">Review collected by and hosted on G2.com.</span></p></div></div><div><div class="l5 mt-2">What do you dislike about Asana?</div><div><p class="formatted-text">There is not a whole lot to dislike about Asana. The only issue that I have seen recently is with the form feature. The issue is that there is not a great process after a form is completed by an outside user. The completed form just shows up on the project that you originally created the form from. <span class="spht">Review collected by and hosted on G2.com.</span></p></div></div><div class="expanded-review-4958603 is-hidden-default"><div class="l5 mt-2">Recommendations to others considering Asana:</div><div><p class="formatted-text">Asana can be used in multiple different ways. It is so easy to communicate directly with employees and clients directly from each project. Asana will keep you organized and it will keep you on track to meet deadlines that you might have. It is easy to invite outside users to specific projects, and you can also control the access for each user. <span class="spht">Review collected by and hosted on G2.com.</span></p></div></div><div class="expanded-review-4958603 is-hidden-default"><div class="l5 mt-2">What problems is Asana solving and how is that benefiting you?</div><div><p class="formatted-text">I have used Asana for three years strictly as a task management solution for our Event App. Recently, I have started to use Asana for several different areas of our business. Asana allows us to keep everything in one place and also allows us to integrate with Google Forms and Zendesk. Asana solved our issue of having information in several different places. Asana has helped us stay organized and operate more efficiently. <span class="spht">Review collected by and hosted on G2.com.</span></p></div></div></div><div class="flex justify-between"><a class="link d-f ai-c x-show-more js-log-click" ue="toggle-class login-modal-toggle" data-toggle-class-targets=".expanded-review-4958603" data-toggle-class-value="is-hidden-default" class="d-f ai-c">Validated Reviewer<svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" contain="paint" buffered-rendering="static" viewBox="0 0 16 12" class="c-teal-100 tiny ml-half icon-checkmark-thick role="presentation"><path d="M13.333 0L6.667 6.667l-4-4L0 5.333 6.667 12 16 2.667z"></path></svg></div></div><div class="tag" data-container="body" title="Invitation from a seller or affiliate. This reviewer was offered a nominal incentive as thanks for completing this review." ue="tooltip">Review source: Seller invite</div><div class="tag" title="This reviewer was offered a nominal incentive as thanks for completing this review." ue="tooltip">Incentivized Review</div></div></div><div class="paper__bd"><div class="d-f mb-1"><div class="f-1 d-f ai-c mb-half-small-only"><div class="stars large xlarge--medium-down stars-10"></div><div class="time-stamp pl-4th ws-nw"><span><span class="x-current-review-date" data-poison-date=""><meta content="2024-06-24" itemprop="datePublished"><time datetime="2024-06-24">Jun 24, 2024</time></span></span></div></div></div><div class="d-f"><div class="f-1"><div data-poison=""><a class="pjax" href="https://www.g2.com/products/asana/reviews/asana-review-9825385"><div class="m-0 l2" itemprop="name">"The perfect tool for my organization"</div></a></div><div data-poison-text=""><div itemprop="reviewBody"><div><div class="l5 mt-2">What do you like best about Asana?</div><div><p class="formatted-text">While I love the project management tools, most of them are not unique to Asana. What I have loved about Asana that has been a huge boon for our organization is the ease of onboarding, the API management for third party integrations, and the user and guest management tools. <span class="spht">Review collected by and hosted on G2.com.</span></p></div></div><div><div class="l5 mt-2">What do you dislike about Asana?</div><div><p class="formatted-text">There is not a lot. There are some tools we make in our API scripts to agregate the data as we enter it into the forms. It would be easier if we could creat those via the Asana UI for our less technical users, that would be ideal. <span class="spht">Review collected by and hosted on G2.com.</span></p></div></div><div class="expanded-review-9825385 is-hidden-default"><div class="l5 mt-2">What problems is Asana solving and how is that benefiting you?</div><div><p class="formatted-text">The biggest issue that Asana solves for our organization is the consolodation of multiple corporate mandated softwares into a single source of truth. It also alows us to easily work with vendors in different countries and manage our domestic team that is distributed around the country. <span class="spht">Review collected by and hosted on G2.com.</span></p></div></div></div><div class="flex justify-between"><a class="link d-f ai-c x-show-more js-log-click" ue="toggle-class login-modal-toggle"
